text: The 1901 Holy Cross Crusaders football team was an American football team that represented the College of the Holy Cross as an independent during the 1901 college football season. In its third season under head coach Maurice Connor, the team compiled a 7–1–1 record and outscored opponents by a total of 126 to 43. The 1901 season was the most successful in the school's history to that time. ==Schedule== ==References== Holy Cross Category:Holy Cross Crusaders football seasons Holy Cross Crusaders football
title: 1901 Holy Cross Crusaders football team
